docs.text: Index Blog EN ¶ Title ¶ Description. Felipe Guedes · @guedesfelipe April 13, 2022 · 10 min read Today, together, MkDocs and Material for MkDocs are among the most popular options when it comes to choosing a static site generator and theme for your technical documentation project. Material for MkDocs ensures that your content is always perfectly presented to your audience, regardless of screen resolution or device capabilities. It has evolved to a framework for technical writing, offering many features, some of which are yet to be found in other static site generators. However, we're far from the end, as 2022 is going to bring some interesting new capabilities. Continue reading Title ¶ Description.
